data_description.daily_percent: The percentage of items in the album that will be from this day on any year. Set this to zero to disable this feature.
data_description.weekly_percent: The percentage of items in the album that will be from this week (next 7 days) on any year. Set this to zero to disable this feature.
data_description.wallpanel_image_url_entity: If Wallpanel is storing the current screensaver image url in an entity, choosing it here will create a sensor that automatically updates with the date of the current image.
